name: Bullet Charge
description:
NOTE: To download the game from the Google Drive link, you'll need to enable popups on itch.io. If this doesn't work, you can go straight to the page by clicking here.

A SCHMUP without any ammo - you'll instead turn the enemies' firepower against them! Orange bullets can be absorbed, while blue and green ones must be avoided at all costs. Be careful though - if you absorb too many bullets, you'll overload and take damage.

Once you've got ammo, charge your laser and prepare to fire - time will slow down while you charge, allowing you to carefully position yourself, though you won't be able to absorb any bullets.

Controls:
Movement - WASD Keys or Left Joystick
Aim - Mouse or Right Joystick
Fire - Left Mouse Button or Right Bumper

Credits:
Art - ShoujouSchmoe & tigersonalex
Programming - Alawliet & srawls
Sound Design - s9meNiNE
Music - StinkBrigade
